metadata.name: Day of Ashura_1
metadata.description:
About the day of Ashura
 
The holy day of Ashura is considered as the day when Imam Hüseyin, the grandson of the Prophet Muhammad, was martyred by Yazid, the son of Muaviye, in Karbala, along with 72 of his friends. The mourning ceremonies for the martyrs take place every year mostly amongst Caferis in Ashura Square located Halkalı, İstanbul.

Place: Turkey,Istanbul
Date: 24 August 2022 13:40

Photographer Engin Güneysu

Bio
Photographer Based in Istanbul,Turkey National Geographic Turkey Prize. iPhone Photo Awards Honorary Award Winner. Street and Documentary Photographer.

Edition 1/1
